about_the_game:
"Embark on a thrilling journey with our new game where every second counts. You control a swift runner, bound by the confines of a rotating ring. With a simple click or a press of the space bar, you can switch between the inner and outer edges of the ring, dodging obstacles that threaten your path.

But beware! The game isn’t as simple as it seems. As time ticks away, you’ll encounter a variety of challenging gimmicks and your speed will progressively increase, pushing your reflexes to the limit.

To add to the thrill, the camera spins continuously, creating a dizzying effect that adds another layer of complexity to your journey. Can you keep up with the pace, or will you let the spinning world get the best of you?

Experience the rush, feel the adrenaline, and keep the runner going in this exhilarating, score-based game. Your agility and quick decision-making skills are the keys to achieving the highest score!"
